title: Russia begins major military drills with Belarus after moves toward closer integration
content:
1. Russia begins major military drills with Belarus after moves toward closer integration  The Washington Post
  2. Russia and Belarus form common energy and financial markets, kick off joint military exercises  DW News
  3. Russia and Belarus Inch Closer to a Full-Blown Merger  The New York Times
  4. Opinion | Vladimir Putin, agent of chaos, is using a huge military exercise to keep the West on edge  The Washington Post
  5. Russia, Belarus launch massive war games – worrying NATO  FRANCE 24 English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
